title: RHOSLC Trailer Recap + RHOP The Crucifixion of Happy & Ness
itunes:title: RHOSLC Trailer Recap + RHOP The Crucifixion of Happy & Ness
itunes:subtitle: Danny breaks down the season 2 trailer for The Real Housewives of Salt Lake City, which featured cult allegations, a sh-arrest, Meredith engaging, and more! After that, Housewives All Stars season 2 is supposedly in the works, and then Danny recaps thi...
description:
Danny breaks down the season 2 trailer for The Real Housewives of Salt Lake City, which featured cult allegations, a sh-arrest, Meredith engaging, and more! After that, Housewives All Stars season 2 is supposedly in the works, and then Danny recaps this week's The Real Housewives of Potomac, which found the women arguing over Happy & Ness in Williamsburg.


Real Housewives All Stars: 20:30ish

RHOP Recap: 24:04ish


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
